# Orphanage (Building)
## Overview
**Orphanage**

**Create** 63 Goods, 7 Influence, 62 Labor, 1 Magic (2,810 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 1 [[Classroom (Room)|Classroom]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 1 [[Infirmary (Room)|Infirmary]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Laundry (Room)|Laundry]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Nursery (Room)|Nursery]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 2 [[Storage (Room)|Storages]]

A place for taking care of a large number of orphans.
